404.title: Page Not Found
404.subtitle: Oops! The page got lost in the digital void
404.description1: The page you’re looking for might have been encrypted beyond recognition or moved to a secure location.
404.description2: No worries, the systems are running normally. This just isn’t the page you were looking for.

403.title: Access Denied
403.subtitle: You do not have permission to access this page.
403.description1: You don’t have the required permissions to view this page.
403.description2: If you believe this is a mistake, contact your administrator.
